mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE_TB ( PROGRAM_WEEK_NO, MENTO_NO, MENTEE_NO, USER_GB, SCHEDULE_GB, CONTENT, SCHEDULE_START_DATETIME, SCHEDULE_FINISH_DATETIME, REG_DT, MOD_DT ) VALUES ( #{program_week_no}, #{mento_no}, #{mentee_no}, #{user_gb}, #{schedule_gb}, #{content}, #{schedule_start_datetime}, #{schedule_finish_datetime}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT ST.SCHEDULE_NO, ST.MENTO_NO, ST.MENTEE_NO, ST.USER_GB, ST.SCHEDULE_GB, ST.CONTENT, ST.SCHEDULE_START_DATETIME, ST.SCHEDULE_FINISH_DATETIME FROM SCHEDULE_TB ST INNER JOIN PROGRAM_WEEK_TB PWT ON ST.PROGRAM_WEEK_NO = PWT.PROGRAM_WEEK_NO WHERE PWT.PROGRAM_WEEK_NO IN ( SELECT PROGRAM_WEEK_NO FROM PROGRAM_WEEK_TB PWT2 WHERE PWT2.PROGRAM_NO = #{program_no} ) OR ST.MENTO_NO = #{user_no} OR ST.MENTEE_NO IN ( SELECT PPT.MENTEE_NO FROM PROGRAM_PARTI_TB PPT INNER JOIN PROGRAM_TB PT2 WHERE PT2.MENTO_NO = #{user_no} ) AND DATE_FORMAT(ST.SCHEDULE_START_DATETIME, "%Y-%m-%d") >= #{schedule_start_date} AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{schedule_start_date}, interval 7 DAY), "%Y-%m-%d") <= DATE_FORMAT(ST.SCHEDULE_FINISH_DATETIME, "%Y-%m-%d")

SELECT ST.SCHEDULE_NO, ST.MENTO_NO, ST.MENTEE_NO, ST.USER_GB, ST.SCHEDULE_GB, ST.CONTENT, ST.SCHEDULE_START_DATETIME, ST.SCHEDULE_FINISH_DATETIME FROM SCHEDULE_TB ST INNER JOIN PROGRAM_WEEK_TB PWT ON ST.PROGRAM_WEEK_NO = PWT.PROGRAM_WEEK_NO WHERE PWT.PROGRAM_WEEK_NO IN ( SELECT PROGRAM_WEEK_NO FROM PROGRAM_WEEK_TB PWT2 WHERE PWT2.PROGRAM_NO = #{program_no} ) OR ST.MENTEE_NO = #{user_no} OR ST.SCHEDULE_GB = '멘토'
